subject: Re: Looking for someone to repro BUG 4503
body:
-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

Volker Lendecke wrote:
> On Wed, Apr 11, 2007 at 08:51:51AM -0500, Gerald (Jerry) Carter wrote:
>> -----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
>> Hash: SHA1
>>
>> Can anyone repro this?
>>
>>   "Unable to join domain after WinServer 2003 upgrade to SP2"
>>   https://bugzilla.samba.org/show_bug.cgi?id=4503
>>
>> Note that the report is using security = domain and not
>> security = ads.
> 
> I'm afraid I only got W2k3 R2 SP2, and there it works with
> the 3.0.24 net binary. W2k3 SP2 might behave differently.

Thanks for trying.  I kind of figured that it might be a little
hard to reproduce based on my own experience.





cheers, jerry
